page.title: 06BUILDINGS IN OADBY
page.content: {Buildings in Oadby} Nearly all of the buildings in Oadby are modern.They also have chimneys which means that they can use combustible fuel.Almost everyone has a television and radio,most also have garages.The majority of the houses have front and back gardens.They are all built in the same style and post-war. Most of the houses are about 20 years old,they are nearly all semi-detachedalthough some are detached.Most of the hoses are covered in a white or cream gritty substance.The area is fairly built-up,and more land has been used over the years.the area has 3 modern schools,Brockshill,Gartree High and Beauchamp College.There is also an old people's home in Oadby.
